eu.aspire_fp7.adss.connectors

Class ACTCConnector

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.aspire_fp7.adss.connectors.ACTCConnector

  • public class ACTCConnector
extends java.lang.Object
    Manages the communications between the ACTC and the ADSS.
    Author:
    Daniele Canavese

    • Method Detail

      • build

        public void build(java.lang.String logFileName)
           throws java.io.IOException,
                  org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException
        Builds the project with the ACTC. This is the first method to call.
        Parameters:
        logFileName - The log file name where to put the logs or null if no log file should be created.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the command cannot be executed.
        org.eclipse.core.runtime.CoreException - If the log file cannot be created.

      • getFiles

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Boolean> getFiles()
                                                           throws java.io.IOException
        Retrieves the source files of an ACTC project.
        Returns:
        A map containing the files names coupled with a boolean stating if they are standard files or not.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If some I/O error occurs.
